verbs.description: WASHINGTON , D.C. -- [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: he is quitting the Iran nuclear deal , pitting him against the United States ' closest allies and leaving the future of Tehran 's nuclear ambitions in question] .
